wine.merlot: Merlot is a dry red wine which is smooth and medium bodied.

wine.chardonnay: Chardonnay is a dry white wine which is bold and full bodied.

wine.malbec: Malbec is a dry red wine which is bold and full bodied.

wine.riesling: Riesling is a white wine which is crisp and light bodied.

wine.cabernet sauvignon: Cabernet Sauvignon is a dry red wine which is bold and full bodied.

wine.pinot noir: Pinot Noir is a dry red wine which is light and fruity.

wine.sauvignon blanc: Sauvignon Blanc is a dry white wine which is smooth and medium bodied.

wine.syrah: Shiraz is a dry red wine which is bold and full bodied.

wine.zinfandel: Zinfandel is a dry red wine which is bold and full bodied.

wine.tempranillo: Tempranillo is a dry red wine which is smooth and medium bodied.

wine.grenache: Grenache is a dry red wine which is smooth and medium bodied.
